nodes.text: A repulsorlift stretcher, repulsor stretcher, repulsorlift gurney, float gurney, float bed, or grav-bed was a type of gurney equipped with anti-gravity technology that was used to carry the grievously injured or unconscious.
Chiewab Amalgamated Pharmaceuticals Company's ECM-598 Medical Backpack contained a collapsible repulsorlift stretcher that could be used by one person and carry up to 150 kilograms.
